column2: Apparently, the blockade has been destroyed.
Yeah. I didn't have a choice.
Okay, but… have you seen the TV? The people are panicking, and random scummy prophets are already predicting the end of the world. You shouldn't have done that.
Martan, I didn't have another choice. I really didn't.

I'm not complaining. Everything's okay… well, sort of. It's just that you could have at least tried to do it quieter. You know, if we wanted to destroy the blockade, we could have just launched a couple of rockets, right?
You're impossible to please. In any case, okay. What's done is done, you can't change that. I have to go.
